text.name: Fell Bullet
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) [BoseProjektil] instead
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [Breath] for every [BoseProjektil] (max 3)
[EndSkill] Lose every [BoseProjektil]
coinDescs: +5% Damage on Critical Hit for every [BoseProjektil] (max 35%)
[CriticalTargetKill] If this unit has the [Bullet] effect, gain 1 [Bullet] (2 times per Encounter)

passiveList.name: Crushed Pendant
passiveList.desc: Combat Start: At 3+ highest Reson., gain 3 [Breath].

text.name: Fell Bullet
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [BoseProjektil] (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. + 2) [BoseProjektil] instead
[BeforeAttack] Deal +2% damage for every [BoseProjektil] (max 14%)
[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [Breath] for every [BoseProjektil] (max 3)
[BeforeAttack] Deal +3% damage for every 5 [Breath] on self (max 15%)
[BeforeAttack] Consume 5 [Breath] on self
[EndSkill] Lose every [BoseProjektil]
